import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-evenimente', templateUrl: './evenimente.component.html', styleUrls: ['./evenimente.component.css'] }) export class EvenimenteComponent { public evenimente: Eveniment[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'api/eveniment/all').subscribe(result => { this.evenimente = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Eveniment { id: string; denumire: string; }
